title: Dephora Super Stretch Chair Sofa Slipcover – Spandex Non Slip Soft Couch Printed Sofa Cover, Washable Furniture Protector with 2 Pillowcases for Kids, Pets （Large Sofa，Big Leaves）
description: High stretchy and craftsmanship make these sofa covers perfect fit for most sizes, practical and aesthetic for your room décor.
SUPER STRETCHY: This super stretchable fabric makes the sofa slipcover more compliant with your sofa.
SUPER STRETCHY: This super stretchable fabric makes the sofa slipcover more compliant with your sofa.
EXQUISITE FABRIC: Soft and comfortable fabric protect your sofa from daily wear and stains.
EXQUISITE FABRIC: Soft and comfortable fabric protect your sofa from daily wear and stains.
DIMENSIONS: Loveseat fits the back of furniture from 54"-67" wide. Sofa-3seater fits the back of furniture from 68"-86" wide. Sofa-4seater fits the back of furniture from 87"-114" wide.
DIMENSIONS: Loveseat fits the back of furniture from 54"-67" wide. Sofa-3seater fits the back of furniture from 68"-86" wide. Sofa-4seater fits the back of furniture from 87"-114" wide.

Make sure that your sofa has deep gap slip the foam bars before purchase.You can tuck the extra fabric and bars into the gap between the back and sitting cushions. Thanks to the superior elasticity and extra material, the slipcover fit the sofa so perfectly that you will not feel it as a separate part of your sofa.
